In CSS rule "h2{color:red;} h2 means class.
Apache is a content management system (CMS).
CSS is a content management system (CMS).
var x="true"; in JavieScript creates a logic value;
Process of finding and deleting mistajes in program is called compiling.
Calling function from itself is called iteration.
PHP code used on a webpage is executed on client's side.
Paper is not inflammable.
Humans see in the infrared.
Name Wac≈Çaw starts with a vowel.
Square has 3 sides.
Every rectangle is a square.
Cirle can be filled in every trapeze.
Cracow is the capital of Poland.
2016 is not a leap-year
Cat has 6 legs
Word "April" starts with a consonant.
